You currently have not archived any items. Archiving allows you to organize content you no longer view into an archive folder and removes the content item from the device freeing up memory. To archive an item tap and hold the item and from the shortcut menu select the move to archive option. You can un-archive content by selecting the content from the archive folder and repeating the steps

Add your credit card information to use paid content on all Samsung Account services. As part of the Samsung SingleSignOnfeature for all Samsung Account services, the default setting will allow you to make your future purchases from any of the Samsung Account services without having to enter your credit card information again. You can manage your credit card informationinthe setting page. Note that your credit cardinformation will be stored, managed and kept by credit card companies or our payment gateway provider. Their privacy policies will apply in relation to your credit card information and other personal details submitted to them. Samsung does not store, manage and/or keep your credit card information
Not enough space in device storage. %.0f more MB needed. Download to SD card

Signing in with a Samsung account will improve recommendations, enable seamless viewing across multiple screens, and simplify the purchase of content from %s. Sign in or create a new Samsung account now?
Why should I use a Samsung account to sign in to %s?

%s is a new way to enhance your TV watching experience. Transform your mobile device into a universal remote control, receive personalised recommendations and switch effortlessly between different screens. TV watching has never been more convenient.
Once you have paired your mobile device and TV, you can move videos back and forth between the two.
You can also bring live programmes from your TV to your tablet.
Once you have set up your remote control, you can use your mobile device to control both your TV and set-top box.
You can view the TV guide after entering your postcode and selecting your TV service provider.
Now you are ready to start exploring %s. Have fun!
Control all your channels with just a touch of your finger.
All the movies and TV shows you want to watch in one place.
Never miss a second of your favourite show.
By pairing with your Samsung TV, you can keep your TV shows with you anywhere in your home.
Which device do you want to use?

Make sure your TV is off. Then, tap the button below to turn on your TV.
Did your TV turn on successfully?
If yes, tap Next. If no, tap Retry.
If your TV still does not turn on, go back and confirm that the selected TV brand is correct. If it still does not work, send us a report.
If your set-top box still does not turn on, go back and confirm that the selected set-top box brand is correct. If it still does not work, send us a report.
Make sure your set-top box is turned off. Then tap the button below to turn on your set-top box.
Did your set-top box turn on successfully?
If yes, tap Next. If no, keep tapping Retry until the correct TV model is found. Currently, you have tried %1$d of %2$d models.
If yes, tap Next. If no, keep tapping Retry until the correct set-top box model is found. Currently, you have tried %1$d of %2$d models.
